briefdescription.para: Gets the next time for an RTS command to run.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function searches the RTS info table to find the next RTS that needs to run based on the time that the rts needs to run and it's priority.

briefdescription.para: Decides whether the ATS or RTS runs next.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function compares the next command times for the RTS and the ATS and decides which one to schedule next.

briefdescription.para: Gets the next RTS command to run.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called when SC_ProcessRtpCommand executes an RTS command and needs to get the next command in the buffer. This routine will get the next RTS command from the currently executing RTS on the active RTP. If this routine finds a fatal error with fetching the next RTS command or cannot find a next RTS command, then the sequence and RTP is stopped.

briefdescription.para: Gets the next ATS command to run.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine gets the next ATS command from the currently executing ATS buffer. If there is no next ATS command then this routine will stop the currently running ATS.
